summary: BuildRequest REQ-1 is a publish-only production deployment with no feature/behavior changes. The diff does not show any deployment trigger/configuration changes, but it does include backend and auth-hook modifications plus documentation and summaries that describe multiple new/changed frontend features, which violates the publish-only constraint.

missing_requirements.requirement: Publish the current build (latest draft) to production so the live production URL serves the same functionality as the draft build.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows added documentation (a deployment guide) but does not include evidence of an actual production deployment being triggered/completing (e.g., CI/CD workflow changes, deployment scripts, environment/prod config updates).

hallucinated_features.description: Changes to car price prediction logic/data model (e.g., introducing yearOfPurchase/usageDuration validations and extended result structure such as breakdown/adjustments).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly constrains this to a publish-only action and lists as non-goals: adding fields or changing the car price prediction logic. The diff modifies backend prediction types and validation logic.

hallucinated_features.description: Modifications to Internet Identity authentication hook behavior/configuration.
hallucinated_features.reason: Publish-only request prohibits behavior changes; diff includes substantive edits to the II hook (AuthClient creation/options, status handling, etc.).

hallucinated_features.description: New/changed UI content unrelated to car price prediction (e.g., "Trending Dress" fashion products section) and other new pages/components (e.g., AdminDashboard, SEOHead, sitemap/robots, expanded SEO metadata).
hallucinated_features.reason: Non-goals include UI/UX redesign or new pages/components; these items are described as present in the frontend summaries but are not requested by REQ-1.

hallucinated_features.description: Addition of production deployment documentation and project state tracking files.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-1 requests an actual production publish; adding docs/state files is not part of the requested functional deliverable and does not itself fulfill deployment.
